title: Understanding Optical Properties
text: Optical properties of a material refer to how it interacts with light. This includes how it absorbs, reflects, and transmits light.

title: Types of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analysis are used to study various properties of materials. These include qualitative, quantitative, and characterization analyses.

title: Characterization Analysis
text: Characterization analysis is used to determine the physical and chemical properties of a material, including its optical properties.

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Which analysis type studies optical properties of a material?
